title: The Danish Industry Foundation boosts research on big social data (CBS - Copenhagen Business School) ...
text: ( Source : CBS - Copenhagen Business School ) The Danish Industry Foundation gave 6.2 m kroner for research on big social data targeting Danish companies. The research project is case based and can, by building new analytical models that
